thread.section_title: The Orange County Register - News Headlines : Sports
thread.title: USC, Cameron Smith keep hope alive with 42-24 victory over No. 3 Utah
thread.title_full: USC, Cameron Smith keep hope alive with 42-24 victory over No. 3 Utah

author: MICHAEL LEV
title: USC, Cameron Smith keep hope alive with 42-24 victory over No. 3 Utah
text: USC, Cameron Smith keep hope alive with 42-24 victory over No. 3 Utah Oct. 24, 2015 Updated 11:27 p.m. 1 of 41 USC freshman linebacker Cameron Smith, right, evades an attempted tackle by Utah quarterback Travis Wilson as he runs toward the end zone with a 54-yard interception return touchdown late in the second quarter of Saturday's game. Smith intercepted Wilson three times in the Trojans' upset victory. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith, center, runs into the end zone after returning an interception 54 yards for a touchdown late in the second quarter of Saturday's game against third-ranked Utah. Smith intercepted Utah quarterback Travis Wilson three times in the Trojans' upset victory. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC freshman linebacker Cameron Smith, left, begins to celebrate with defensive end Greg Townsend Jr. after Smith returned an interception 54 yards for a touchdown late in the second quarter of Saturday's game against third-ranked Utah. Smith intercepted Utah quarterback Travis Wilson three times in the Trojans' upset victory. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC defensive tackle Delvon Simmons sacks Utah quarterback Travis Wilson late in the second quarter of Saturday's game at the Coliseum. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC fullback Soma Vainuku, top, dives into the end zone for a game-tying touchdown during the second quarter of Saturday's game against third-ranked Utah. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC fullback Soma Vainuku, left, celebrates with cornerback Adoree' Jackson after diving into the end zone for a 1-yard touchdown run late in the second quarter of Saturday's game against third-ranked Utah. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith intercepts a Utah pass intended for Utah running back Devontae Booker late in the second quarter. Smith returned it 54 yards for a touchdown that gave USC a 28-14 lead late in the second quarter of Saturday's game against third-ranked Utah. Smith intercepted Utah quarterback Travis Wilson three times in the Trojans' upset victory. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC guard Damien Mama, left, and tight end Tyler Petite, right, celebrate after quarterback Cody Kessler scored a touchdown on a 1-yard run during the third quarter of Saturday's game against Utah. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 After catching a pass, USC's Adoree' Jackson, left, is tripped up just short of the goal line by Utah defensive back Justin Thomas during the third quarter. The play set up a touchdown as the Trojans rolled to a 42-24 victory. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC coach Clay Helton yells encouragement to his players in the fourth quarter against Utah in Saturday. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith, right, intercepts a pass intended for Utah tight end Harrison Handley during the fourth quarter of Saturday's game. Smith had three interceptions, including one he returned for a touchdown. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith, right, intercepts a pass intended for Utah tight end Harrison Handley during the fourth quarter of Saturday's game. Smith, a freshman, had three interceptions, including one he returned for a touchdown. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith, center, takes off running after making his third interception as Utah players give chase during the fourth quarter of Saturday's game. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith, center, is congratulated by teammates after his third interception during the fourth quarter of Saturday's game against third-ranked Utah. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster reaches up to catch a 25-yard touchdown pass during the fourth quarter of Saturday's 42-24 victory over third-ranked Utah. Smith-Schuster finished with eight catches for 143 yards. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster makes a catch as Utah linebacker Gionni Paul trails behind during the second half of Saturday’s game. Smith-Schuster had eight catches for 143 yards and a touchdown. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 Utah wide receiver Britain Covey celebrates his touchdown during the first half. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 Utah wide receiver Britain Covey, top, rolls over the top of USC linebacker Su’a Cravens for a touchdown during the first half of Saturday’s game. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC running back Justin Davis celebrates after scoring a touchdown during the first quarter of Saturday’s game against Utah. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC running back Justin Davis drops the ball after scoring a touchdown during the first quarter of Saturday’s game against third-ranked Utah at the Coliseum. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC wide receiver De’Quan Hampton, right, makes a catch along the sideline in front of Utah defensive backs Dominique Hatfield, left, and Chase Hansen during the first half of Saturday’s game at the Coliseum. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC interim head coach Clay Helton talks to his team during the first half of Saturday’s game against third-ranked Utah at the Coliseum. Helton’s Trojans dealt the Utes their first loss of the season. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC quarterback Cody Kessler is sacked by Utah defensive end Hunter Dimick during the first half. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC quarterback Cody Kessler is sacked by Utah defensive tackle Filipo Mokofisi during the first half. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC running back Ronald Jones II, right, gets past Utah defensive back Marcus Williams during the first half. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 Utah quarterback Travis Wilson (San Clemente High) passes during the first half of Saturday’s game against USC at the Coliseum. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 Utah linebacker Jason Whittingham, right, grabs the facemask of USC running back Dominic Davis during the first half. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC interim head coach Clay Helton walks off the field after the Trojans beat third-ranked Utah, 42-24, on Saturday at the Coliseum. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith, left, intercepts a pass as Utah tight end Harrison Handley watches during the fourth quarter. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC players celebrate together after they beat third-ranked Utah, 42-24, Saturday at the Coliseum. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith shakes hands with fans after the Trojans beat third-ranked Utah, 42-24, on Saturday at the Coliseum. Smith had three interceptions, including one he returned for a touchdown. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Jabari Ruffin celebrates with fans after the Trojans beat third-ranked Utah, 42-24, on Saturday at the Coliseum. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC linebacker Cameron Smith, left, intercepts a pass off his own deflection during the fourth quarter. It was his third interception of the game. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC wide receiver De'Quan Hampton celebrates with teammates after the Trojans beat third-ranked Utah, 42-24, Saturday at the Coliseum. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 41 USC wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster, right, heads in for a touchdown as Utah defensive back Justin Thomas trails behind during the fourth quarter. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 Utah head coach Kyle Whittingham watches from the sideline during the first half of Saturday’s game against USC at the Coliseum. Many believe Whittingham is among the candidates for the USC job. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 Utah head coach Kyle Whittingham watches from the sideline during the first half of Saturday’s game against USC at the Coliseum. Many believe Whittingham is among the candidates for the USC job. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC freshman linebacker Cameron Smith directs the USC Marching Band after the Trojans defeated third-ranked Utah, 42-24, Saturday at the Coliseum. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC freshman linebacker Cameron Smith directs the USC Marching Band after the Trojans defeated third-ranked Utah, 42-24, Saturday at the Coliseum. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC linebacker Jabari Ruffin, center, celebrates with his teammates after they defeated third-ranked Utah, 42-24, Saturday night at the Coliseum. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 1 of 41 USC interim head coach Clay Helton, right, puts his arm around freshman offensive tackle Chuma Edoga as they walk off the field after a 42-24 victory over third-ranked Utah on Saturday night at the Coliseum. MARK J. TERRILL, , MARK J. TERRILL, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS View slideshow USC freshman linebacker Cameron Smith, right, evades an attempted tackle by Utah quarterback Travis Wilson as he runs toward the end zone with a 54-yard interception return touchdown late in the second quarter of Saturday's game. Smith intercepted Wilson three times in the Trojans' upset victory. PAUL RODRIGUEZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER
